title: Citi Fourth Quarter 2012 Fixed Income Investor Review
summary: New York - John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer, and Eric Aboaf, Treasurer, will conduct the Citigroup fourth quarter 2012 Fixed Income Investor Review at 10:30 a.m. (EST) on Friday, January 25, 2013. The review will be available live via webcast and teleconference.
tag-1: Citi Fourth Quarter 2012 Fixed Income Investor Review
tag-2: New York – John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer, and Eric Aboaf, Treasurer, will conduct the Citigroup fourth quarter 2012 Fixed Income Investor Review at 10:30 a.m. (EST) on Friday, January 25, 2013. The review will be available live via webcast and teleconference.
tag-3: The webcast and presentation materials will be available at https://www.citigroup.com/global/investors/. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available after the call.
tag-4: To dial-in to the live teleconference, please dial:
tag-5: US & Canada: (855) 217-4405 International Callers: (719) 325-2825 Conference code: 3922744
tag-6: Telephone lines will open at 10:15 a.m. (EST).
tag-7: A telephonic replay of the call will be available beginning approximately two hours after the event until Friday, February 8, 2013, by calling (888) 203-1112 (U.S. and Canada callers) or (719) 457-0820 (for international callers). Conference code: 3922744.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citigroup provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-9: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
